name: WorkoutRoutine
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: workout routine
des:
Say “Alexa, open workout routine” and she’ll ask you to create a workout session, composed of the number of exercises, time between each exercise and a resting time. For the exercise time say the time in seconds, and for the resting time say at the end the keyword "rest", in order to distinguish it from the exercise time. During the workout you can listen to your favorite music in background, just ask Alexa to play music, then call the Workout Routine skill.

Example of workout session: "5 exercises, 40 seconds for each exercise and 10 seconds of rest"

For more information about how the skill works, say “Alexa, explain to me how to use the skill”.
Please leave a review and share this skill with everyone.
Feel free to contact me if you have any suggestions: catalin.moldovan97@icloud.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
